MajorClaims.Text: every prospective between generations alters and especially the challenges for this generation are significantly different from the last generation
challenges for this generation are more complicated and diverse than the past generation, whether in career or in self-identification

Claims.Text: it is no doubt that until the next generation, there will be whole new challenges waiting for the next youngsters
under globalization and industrial integration, the work-related challenges for this generation are getting more complicated and challenging
young people in this generation are exposed to more creative ideas and rather think individually
this generation is encountering the self-recognition issue which could not be experienced by the previous generation

Premises.Text: In the past, focusing on one skill was enough to deal with the problems
every industry was rather small in size and simple to manage
as those industries expand and become internationalized, people are required to equip with multiple skills to answer those challenges
now there are more chances to do business with people around the world
besides one's own profession, language ability is essential as well
financial crimes are rampant in the 21st century
surging up demands for those who excel at both laws and financial management
The past generation was given less freedom and was usually asked to follow the paths their parents had prepared for them
They are eager for finding who they are and what they really want
It is fortunate that they can struggle with these sweet worries and these worries are indeed never easy for them
They have to make decisions between so many possibilities and they are responsible for taking the consequences
